intro.title: Hello, I'm
intro.subtitle: Fullstack Web Developer
intro.description: Hello, I'm a Fullstack Web Developer, and I love the challenge of creating creative and innovative solutions to technical problems that require a lot of effort to solve. This website is where I present my work and introduce myself to you.

description.firstParagraph: I am a Full Stack Web Developer with more than a year of experience in developing various web applications that use modern technologies such as Laravel, ReactJS, NextJS and Node.js.
description.secondParagraph: I have a great passion for building tech solutions and improving the user experience.
